mapper.select: SELECT t_role.id,t_role.name,content,p.name as createName,create_date as createDate FROM t_role LEFT JOIN t_personalinfo as p ON p.job_id=t_role.create_id LIMIT #{before},#{after}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_role WHERE name=#{name}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_role SET name=#{name},content=#{content} WHERE name=#{oldName}
mapper.select: SELECT t_role.name as rName,t_personalinfo.job_id as jobId,t_personalinfo.name as name,t_department.department_name as dename,t_occupation.occupation_name AS ocname FROM t_role INNER JOIN t_userrole ON t_userrole.role_id=t_role.id INNER JOIN t_personalinfo ON t_personalinfo.job_id=t_userrole.job_id INNER JOIN t_department ON t_department.department_id=t_personalinfo.department_id INNER JOIN t_occupation ON t_occupation.occupation_id=t_personalinfo.occupation_id WHERE t_role.id=#{id} LIMIT #{before},#{after}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_userrole WHERE role_id=(SELECT id FROM t_role WHERE name=#{name})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_userrole WHERE job_id=#{jobId} and role_id=(SELECT id FROM t_role WHERE name=#{rName})
